sentences.en: ...a federal grand-jury probe into corruption within the FDA.
sentences.cn: …联邦大陪审团对食品及药品管理局内部腐败的一次调查。

sentences.en: A doctor used a probe to remove metal fragments from a wound.
sentences.cn: 医生用探针将伤口中的金属碎片取出.

sentences.en: a fibre-optic probe
sentences.cn: 一根光纤探针

sentences.en: A low - sensitivity probe was purchased to cope with the ore.
sentences.cn: 低灵敏度的探测器用于测量岩心.

sentences.en: a police corruption probe
sentences.cn: 对警察贪污行为的彻底调查

sentences.en: At first two chess players probe mutually.
sentences.cn: 起先两个棋手互相试探.

sentences.en: Grasp probe by large ring at top.
sentences.cn: 用手拿住探头顶部的大环.

sentences.en: In roundabout conversations, full of traps and detours, one man would probe another's views.
sentences.cn: 在拐弯抹角的交谈中, 互相套对方的想法,又给自己留后路,以防万一.

sentences.en: Police probed claims that he had sold drugs.
sentences.cn: 警方就有人称他贩卖毒品一事进行了调查。

sentences.en: Pug decided to risk a probe.
sentences.cn: 帕格决定冒昧试探一下.

sentences.en: She tried to probe my mind and discovered what I was thinking.
sentences.cn: 她设法了解我的思想,试图发现我在想些什么.

sentences.en: The brain surgeon asked the nurse to pass him a probe.
sentences.cn: 脑外科医生要护士将探针递给他.

sentences.en: The police probe into organized crime led to several arrests.
sentences.cn: 警方对有组织犯罪的调查使数人受到拘捕.

sentences.en: The probe is sensitive enough to detect the presence of a single microbe.
sentences.cn: 这个探针的灵敏度很高,足以测出任何微生物的存在.

sentences.en: The probe unit is hermetically sealed.
sentences.cn: 探头装置是密封的.

sentences.en: The surgeon would pick up his instruments, probe, repair and stitch up again.
sentences.cn: 外科医生会拿起他的工具，探查、修复然后再重新缝合。

sentences.en: The surgeon would pick up his instruments, probe, repair, and stitch up again.
sentences.cn: 外科医生会拿起器械进行探查、修复，然后再缝合。

sentences.en: They will probe deeply into the matter.
sentences.cn: 他们将深入调查这件事.

sentences.en: This is not a laughing matter. It is an affair I am resolved to probe thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 这不是什么说笑话儿的事情. 这是一桩我决定要彻底弄清楚的事情.

sentences.en: Well , I don't think you have the ability to probe into someone else's heart. "
sentences.cn: 我瞧你就没本领钻到人心里去. ”

words.tran_cn: 试用人员；实习生；缓刑犯；试读生

phrases.tran_cn: 探头检测；探测试验；探头试验
n. 传感探头，感测探针；敏感元件
温度探头；测温传感器；温度探测器；温度探针

trans.tran_cn: [医]（对伤处等的）针探，探查，[医]探针，取样器，探头，探测仪
trans.tran_en: a long thin metal instrument that doctors and scientists use to examine parts of the body

trans.tran_cn: 医学探针；新闻调查；探测
trans.tran_en: to ask questions in order to find things out, especially things that other people do not want you to know
to look for something or examine something, using a long thin object

trans.tran_cn: 盘问，（用试探性袭击等）侦察（敌情），用尖物刺穿（物件），用力使向前推进
探索，调查，用探针（或探测器等）探查，探测
